channel.title: Comments on: Monday Go Meditation: Game 54

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Thanks Wren! Appreciate the words of support!
item.content:encoded: Thanks Wren! Appreciate the words of support!

item.title: By: wren
item.dc:creator: wren
item.description: Not at all! You made some very good decisions throughout the early game that put you far ahead. Your opponent made a desperate gamble and caught you in a series of mistakes, any one of which would have resulted in a won game for you (ko, connection to center, o9). It's easy for me to critique in hindsight, but hard to execute under pressure =) nice review, keep up the interesting content!
item.content:encoded:
Not at all! You made some very good decisions throughout the early game that put you far ahead. Your opponent made a desperate gamble and caught you in a series of mistakes, any one of which would have resulted in a won game for you (ko, connection to center, o9). It’s easy for me to critique in hindsight, but hard to execute under pressure =)
nice review, keep up the interesting content!

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Agreed. I should not have been in such a rush to kill him.
item.content:encoded: Agreed. I should not have been in such a rush to kill him.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Ah yes. Good point. That would have worked too. Oh how poor my reading ability is... haha.
item.content:encoded: Ah yes. Good point. That would have worked too. Oh how poor my reading ability is… haha.

item.title: By: wren
item.dc:creator: wren
item.description: Also it's not p10 but o9 that is the mistake. if you connect o10 you are fine.
item.content:encoded: Also it’s not p10 but o9 that is the mistake. if you connect o10 you are fine.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Agreed. I should have been happy to connect, but I was too bloodthirsty and wanted to kill him so I omitted the connection. Bad mistake on my part.
item.content:encoded: Agreed. I should have been happy to connect, but I was too bloodthirsty and wanted to kill him so I omitted the connection. Bad mistake on my part.

item.title: By: wren
item.dc:creator: wren
item.description: Actually, why not 165 g11 atari? Geta at j9 and happilly connect...
item.content:encoded: Actually, why not 165 g11 atari? Geta at j9 and happilly connect…

item.title: By: wren
item.dc:creator: wren
item.description: 169 g11 atari?? white gets ko but better than this I think. Most of your stones will live.
item.content:encoded: 169 g11 atari?? white gets ko but better than this I think. Most of your stones will live.

item.title: By: Marek Jasovsky
item.dc:creator: Marek Jasovsky
item.description: Exactly. Most of cases.. Seeing potential of ko, İ rather as avoid it, not to be confronted with it later and failing... Maybe should change my attitude there...
item.content:encoded: Exactly. Most of cases.. Seeing potential of ko, İ rather as avoid it, not to be confronted with it later and failing… Maybe should change my attitude there…

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Haha. Yup. I look forward to the day when I can see a ko and go, "Do I have enough ko threats?" to determine whether I should fight one or not. That will be awesome when I can.
item.content:encoded: Haha. Yup. I look forward to the day when I can see a ko and go, “Do I have enough ko threats?” to determine whether I should fight one or not. That will be awesome when I can.
